oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Potato Blight (Phytophthora infestans) field demonstrations, 2004
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frost, D
Clarke, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Root crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The results are presented of a trial of 28 potato varieties, including 19 blight-resistant Sarpo varieties, at Llanrhystud in Ceredigion. The effects of compost tea preparations in protecting against blight were also studied.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Frost, D and Clarke, A (2005) Potato Blight (Phytophthora infestans) field demonstrations, 2004. Organic Centre Wales.
